

http://davidbrunton.com/2010/03/18/versioning-bags/
David Brunton investigates versioning of bags using CDL's ReDD

http://groups.google.com/group/digital-curation/browse_thread/thread/ad054277cb0318ce/5717bfeb95f2a957?lnk=gst&q=versioning#5717bfeb95f2a957
digital-curation group discusses above blog post
Also touches on CDLs Dflat design for a storage architecture

http://tonluong.com/projects/digital-packaging-format
Ton Luong writes about an alternative design combining GIT, JSON, CouchDB, & Parchive for the functinality of versioning, transport, metadata formatting and storage, and error correction.
- http://couchdb.apache.org/docs/overview.html 

http://groups.google.com/group/digital-curation/browse_thread/thread/6c1ad7d6b35ec721/b3293ef6add8ac25?lnk=gst&q=versioning#b3293ef6add8ac25
Contines the discussion of bag versioning, including why Dflat is being used by CDL instead of BagIt for long-term managment of data
https://confluence.ucop.edu/display/Curation/Storage 
https://confluence.ucop.edu/display/Curation/CAN 
https://confluence.ucop.edu/display/Curation/D-flat 
https://confluence.ucop.edu/display/Curation/Home 
other posts inquire about the possible advantages of ReDD over GIT

http://groups.google.com/group/digital-curation/web/curatecamp-2010-versioning?hl=en
Looks like there was a breakout session to discuss versioning at CurateCamp-2010

http://inkdroid.org/journal/2010/08/17/version-control-and-digital-curation/
Ed Summers wrote a blog post

http://groups.google.com/group/digital-curation/browse_thread/thread/1f1b6b0629699a8e/c9816863970db69f?lnk=gst&q=versioning#c9816863970db69f
Discusses a proposal for a RESTful Bag Server, which includes versioning semantics

...
B. Version handling – Chris confirmed that the best approach to handle 
the awareness of most current version of an uploaded bag would be to 
dedicate a symbolic link location (/version/latest). 


=======================

https://www.escidoc.org/media/docs/ges-versioning-article.pdf
Versioning of Digital Objects in a Fedora-based Repositor
Matthias Razum, Frank Schwichtenberg, Rozita Fridman
